DataElement.preferredName: Person Passive Smoke Exposure Hour Per Day Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The number of hours per day a non-smoker is exposed to tobacco smoke products.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Passive Smoke Exposure Hour Per Day
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A human being._Exposure to tobacco smoke products among individuals who do not smoke. This can result from sharing space with a smoker or from placental transfer from mother to fetus._A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day._A frequency rate of occurrences of something within a period of time equal to twenty-four hours.

Property.preferredName: Hour Per Day Passive Smoke Exposure
Property.preferredDefinition: A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.:A frequency rate of occurrences of something within a period of time equal to twenty-four hours.:Exposure to tobacco smoke products among individuals who do not smoke. This can result from sharing space with a smoker or from placental transfer from mother to fetus.

Concepts.definition: A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.
A frequency rate of occurrences of something within a period of time equal to twenty-four hours.
Exposure to tobacco smoke products among individuals who do not smoke. This can result from sharing space with a smoker or from placental transfer from mother to fetus.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 04/16/2018: CM Released as part of draft content review

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A numeral or string of numerals for a frequency rate of occurrences within a period of time in which something continues in unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes._A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day._A frequency rate of occurrences of something within a period of time equal to twenty-four hours.

Concepts.definition: A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.
A frequency rate of occurrences of something within a period of time equal to twenty-four hours.
